Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Trump did not ban bump stocks, when in fact he did enact a bump stock ban.
Understate: The claim understates the actions taken by Trump by not acknowledging that he did ban bump stocks, although it may not have been as quick as desired.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Trump's failure to ban bump stocks was solely due to the influence of the NRA, without considering other factors that may have influenced the decision.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that Trump did not ban bump stocks.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why Trump may have taken longer to ban bump stocks, such as legal or logistical considerations.
